content:
# The inspection of the furnace revealed that it has successfully produced 1 iron plate and currently contains 6 units of iron ore. 
# This indicates that the smelting process did occur, but it seems to have been slower than anticipated.

# Now that I have at least one iron plate, I can proceed to collect it from the furnace and check my inventory again.

# I'll extract the iron plate from the furnace.
extract_item(furnace, Prototype.IronPlate, quantity=1)  # Extracting 1 iron plate from the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after extraction: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display the updated inventory.
